name: Homemade Pizza
ingredients: 1 package (2 1/4 teaspoons) of active dry yeast
feta cheese, firm mozzarella chese, grated
instructions: Place the warm water in the large bowl of a heavy duty stand mixer. Sprinkle the yeast over the warm water and let it sit for 5 minutes ntil the yeast is dissolved.
Add the flour, salt, sugar, and olive oil, and using the mixing paddle attachment, mix on low speed for a minute. Then replace the mixing paddle with the dough hook attachment

name: Hamburger
